header.title: Video Director Pro
header.subtitle: Your self-tape coach
header.description:
Pro feedback. Real insight. Your breakthrough.
Reality TV meets film meets your next callback.

capabilitiesModal.subtitle: Simple and easy. Upload a video, attach a script or guidelines (for max accuracy), add optional instructions for the experts, and hit ACTION!

capabilitiesCoach.0_desc: Full trainee management system - add, edit, delete, manage personal info (name, email, phone, notes).
capabilitiesCoach.1_desc: Save all analyses linked to trainees, track progress over time, view all saved analyses.
capabilitiesCoach.2_desc: Compare analyses across trainees or over time - up to 4 analyses side by side with detailed comparison table.
capabilitiesCoach.3_desc: Create professional PDF reports for each trainee - all analyses, trends, stats, and development over time.
capabilitiesCoach.4_desc: Choose from 4 fields: actors, musicians, creators, influencers - each with dedicated experts.
capabilitiesCoach.5_desc: Choose standard or deep analysis - professional with timecodes, micro-analysis, comparison to standards, detailed recommendations.
capabilitiesCoach.6_desc: Freely select experts per field - top 3 by default, switch between "Top 3" and "All 8".
capabilitiesCoach.7_desc: All data stored locally in browser - trainees, analyses, comparisons persist between sessions.
capabilitiesCoach.8_desc: View trainee development over time - trends, improvements, strengths, weaknesses, professional recommendations.
capabilitiesCoach.9_desc: Unique premium design, intuitive management, professional tools for coaches and agencies.

auth.passwordResetTitle: We'll email you a reset link

analysis.expertsIntro: : who they are, what they look for
analysis.emptyPromptFallback: Please analyze the attached media based on the system instructions.

coachTrack.restrictionMessage: Premium track is for coaches, studios and acting schools only. Upgrade to access.
coachTrack.alertMessage: Premium track is for coaches, studios and acting schools only. Upgrade your plan to access.
coachTrack.cardTooltip: Premium track is not included in your plan. Browse to see, upgrade to analyze.

coachGuide.title: Usage & management – Premium track
coachGuide.subtitle: Simple guide for coaches and studios
coachGuide.step1Desc: Click "Trainee management" and add new trainees. For each trainee you can add name, email, phone and notes. Trainees are saved automatically in your browser.
coachGuide.step2Desc: Select the training field: actors, musicians, creators, or influencers. Each field has dedicated experts for professional analysis.
coachGuide.step3Desc: Select the experts for the analysis. By default the top 3 are selected, but you can pick specific experts or switch to "All 8" with one click.
coachGuide.step4Desc: Choose between standard (focused and clear) or deep analysis (detailed with timecodes, micro-analysis, and comparison to professional standards). Deep analysis suits professional coaches.
coachGuide.step5Desc: Select the trainee from the list. This is important to save the analysis with the correct trainee.
coachGuide.step6Desc: Upload the video (limits vary by plan), add optional instructions, and click "ACTION!" to start. Results appear in seconds.
coachGuide.step7Desc: After receiving the analysis, click "Save for trainee" to save it. It will be linked to the selected trainee and available for later viewing.
coachGuide.step8Desc: Use "Compare takes" to compare analyses, and "Export PDF" in the trainee management screen to create a professional report with all analyses and trends.
coachGuide.warningP1: All data (trainees, analyses, comparisons) is stored locally in your browser only.
coachGuide.warningP2: If you clear browser history or data, all information will be deleted and cannot be recovered.
coachGuide.warningP3: We strongly recommend using "Export data" to back up all data on your computer.
coachGuide.tip2: Unlimited trainees and analyses can be saved
coachGuide.tip3: Comparisons allow progress tracking over time
coachGuide.tip4: Professional PDF reports ready for print or sharing

subscription.contactTitle: Have more questions or need support?
subscription.contactDesc: Have questions? Send us a message and we'll get back soon
subscription.faq0q: Is the service suitable for beginners?
subscription.faq0a: Yes. The app suits creators at any level, including with no prior experience.
subscription.faq1a: Simply upload a video, add context if you want, and our AI analyzes the content with 8 virtual experts based on your track.
subscription.faq2q: What happens if I exceed the analysis quota?
subscription.faq2a: When you reach the limit, you can upgrade or wait for the monthly renewal. We never charge automatically.
subscription.faq3a: Some videos (especially from iPhone) are saved in very high quality and the file size is too large. Send it to yourself via WhatsApp and download again. The file will be smaller and analysis will stay accurate.
subscription.faq4a: No. All plans are monthly with no commitment. You pay only for what you use.
subscription.faq5a: Yes. You can cancel anytime. The subscription stays active until the end of the current billing period.
subscription.faq6q: What happens after cancel or pause?
subscription.faq6a: After cancel or pause, access remains active until the end of the billing period and no further charges are made.
subscription.faq7a: No. Billing is for a usage period that has already started, so refunds are not available.

trackDescription.actors: The main audition room of top drama productions—in your pocket. Cinematic standard. No compromise.
trackDescription.musicians: The judging panel of major music shows and top labels—in your pocket.
trackDescription.creators: The algorithm of TikTok, Reels, YouTube—in your pocket.
trackDescription.influencers: The strategy room of major brands and top agencies—in your pocket.
trackDescription.coach: Pro platform for coaches and agencies. Deep analysis, progress tracking, pro reports.
